data.message: I love fb! I've met alot of great people that I call friends now. Also it's connected me with a lot of old friends! And family....thank you fb!

replies.message: You're welcome, Donna! We're glad you are able to connect with your friends and family. -Hannah

I love what you did with friends day and around the world with my family  and friends. These things  really mean a lot to me. So thank you FaceBook for being their for me. I have 11 grandchildren and 18 great-grand-children. I have  4brothers and  2 sisters  and 3children and they are all on FB so now I know how all of my family are doing. If anyone gets or the baby's do there cute things then I know. You people at Facebook have made this all possible for me ,so The is again and God Bless you all.
